title: Ada Solomon - Wikipedia
snippet: Ada Solomon (born 3 June 1968 in Bucharest) is a Romanian film producer behind over 60 movies. After first working in marketing, she turned to media companies in 1993 and produced her first film Asphalt Tango in 1995.

title: Ada Solomon | Producer, Production Manager, Actress
snippet: Ada Solomon. Producer: Bad Luck Banging or Loony Porn. Ada Solomon was born on 3 June 1968 in Bucharest, Romania. She is a producer and production manager. She is married to Alexandru Solomon.

title: Ada Solomon — Network — EAVE
snippet: From 2004, setting up her own company - HiFilm, Ada has produced award-winning shorts by Cristian Nemescu (MARILENA FROM P7) & Radu Jude (THE TUBE WITH A HAT), debut features by Radu Jude (THE HAPPIEST GIRL IN THE WORLD), Melissa de Raaf, Razvan Radulescu (FIRST OF ALL, FELICIA), Paul Negoescu (A MONTH IN THAILAND) and documentaries by Alexandru Solomon (KAPITALISM - OUR IMPROVED FORMULA), among others.
